entry.title: Quadratic Gorenstein rings and the Koszul property II
entry.summary: In a previous paper, we use idealization to construct numerous examples of standard graded quadratic Gorenstein rings having regularity three which are not Koszul, negatively answering a question of Conca, Rossi, and Valla. This paper is the natural continuation of that work; it aims to completely answer the question for which codimensions $c$ and regularities $r$ is every quadratic Gorenstein ring $R$ with $\mathrm{codim}\, R = c$ and $\mathrm{reg}\, R = r$ Koszul. We prove that quadratic Gorenstein rings with $c = r+1$ are always Koszul, and for all $c \geq r+2 \geq 6$, we construct quadratic Gorenstein rings that are not Koszul.
